lyrics:
41 contributorsi must apologise lyricsverse 1
i never wanted to cause doubt in your mind
im not acting the way i think youd like
we went for dinner and now youre acting paranoid
if only you knew the way i felt inside on that night

refrain
oohooh oohooh oohooh oohooh
oohooh oohooh oohooh oohooh
oohooh oohooh oohooh oohooh
oohooh oohooh oohooh oohooh

verse 2
your paranoia it happens all the time
and thats cause lyings a big problem of mine just a problem for me
but i still do it now im by myself again
i tell so many that i cant see them end so i said

prechorus
if i could i would make amends
today i wrote a list of them
the way it starts the way it ends
i signed my name in marker pen yeah

chorus
i must apologise
before i end thе night
see pinkpantheress liveget tickets as low as 43you might also likepostchorus
its not a game i want to change
thesе days it doesnt feel the same
the way it did some years before
ive lost so much ill lose some more

verse 3
im not able
to tell you what you need its a shame cause
they say i should be honest more one day im sure
ill figure out the reason i was telling lies for

refrain
